body:
See Chapter 5 here for a comparison of sky models including Perez.


http://www.iesd.dmu.ac.uk/~jm/doku.php?id=resources:thesis


Skip to page 41 in the PDF (numbered 203) to see how Perez compares to  
a simple clear-overcast blend for predictions of *internal*  
illuminance against measured values in a full-size office space.


-John




Dr. John Mardaljevic
Reader in Daylight Modelling
Institute of Energy and Sustainable Development
